attributes.action: Cancel fees for students nurses, who have to work as part of their course.
attributes.additional_details: In addition to student fees, accommodation fees, they have travel cost, and parking costs.  Working at the hospital full time, and studying they spend more time than most other students, working towards their qualification, that have time to do part time work to help pay for their courses and living expenses.  Where is the reward for the young people to go into nursing, an area were there is a shortage.  Cancel all fees, and cover travel and parking costs.
attributes.background: Cancel fees for students nurses, who have to work full time as part of their course. With the students working, they are already saving the government money by assisting qualified nursing staff.
